inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getLocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroups.

filters.description: One or more configuration blocks containing name-values filters. See the [EC2 API Reference](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeLocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroups.html) for supported filters. Detailed below.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags, each pair of which must exactly match a pair on the desired local gateway route table.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getLocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroups.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

ids.description: Set of EC2 Local Gateway Virtual Interface Group identifiers.

localGatewayVirtualInterfaceIds.description: Set of EC2 Local Gateway Virtual Interface identifiers.
